title: Spaghetti Carbonara
methods: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, cook pancetta until crispy.
Add eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper to a bowl and whisk until combined.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the pancetta.
Pour the egg mixture over the pasta and toss to coat.
Serve immediately with additional Parmesan cheese.
description: A rich and creamy Italian pasta dish.
